snippet: The inquiries follow calls in Congress this week for a crackdown after a recent series of disclosures on topics ranging from drone strikes to a computer virus attack against Iran’s nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: The inquiries follow calls in Congress this week for a crackdown after a recent series of disclosures on topics ranging from drone strikes to a computer virus attack against Iran’s nuclear program.

headline.main: Criminal Inquiries Into National Securities Leaks Are Begun
